libdmg-hfsplus passed import security review on 2025-11-18, for the
use anticipated in README.chromium: building and running this toolchain
in an isolated VM without access to signing keys, as part of the Mac
packaging process in Chrome's build.

A copy of the chrome-security@google.com thread discussing this is
available at
https://docs.google.com/document/d/1ehTnfTjB-UxAhTUoi3gWPbyGfxp_7M5xzEVeMiYnURs/edit?usp=sharing&resourcekey=0-LEavtknvisY8ddmRWYdxtg
